title: Drawing, "The Virgin of the Coronation or the Ascension (b)", 1600–50
medium: Black chalk on gray paper with white heightening
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Recto: (a) Three quarter figure.  Shown from front with naked upper part of body.  She is sitting beside something, upon which she leans her arm that supports her hear.  Verso: (b) the Virgin kneeling in clouds, shown from the front; above at right the outlines of a flying angel.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Virgin of the Coronation or the Ascension (b)", 1600–50.
1600–50. Black chalk on gray paper with white heightening. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-19.
